item.title: Setting the Parameters: A Strange World System
item.description: Story, Jonathan. “Setting the Parameters: A Strange World System.” In Strange Power: Shaping the Parameters of International Relations and International Political Economy, edited by Thomas Lawton, James Rosenau, Amy C. Verdun, 41-60. London: Routledge, 2000. Keywords: Knowledge; Political Economy; Structural Power, Power; International Relations; General Framework Text access (external link)
